quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), 23rd Annual General Meeting of the Developing Countries Vaccine Manufacturers Network (DCVMN) was held in Pune, Maharashtra. Which of the following organizations co-hosted the event along with DCVMN?
options: Bharat Biotech
Serum Institute of India
Zydus Lifesciences
Biocon
None of the above

quiz.text: During his address at the International Conference on ‘Biofuels – A Pathway towards Sustainable Future’, the Union Minister for Petroleum & Natural Gas has announced that India would be launching Global Alliance on Biofuels under its G20 Presidency. India would be launching the initiative along with which of the following countries?
options: UK
Brazil
USA
Both [1] & [2]
Both [2] & [3]

quiz.text: During his address at the International Conference on ‘Biofuels – A Pathway towards Sustainable Future’, the Union Minister of Petroleum & Natural Gas has mentioned that the target year of blending 20% ethanol with petrol under the National Policy on Biofuels – 2018 has been advanced to ______ from 2030.
options: ESY 2025-26
ESY 2023-24
ESY 2024-25
ESY 2027-28
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), Union Minister for Youth Affairs and Sports Shri Anurag Singh launched a Mega Cleanliness Drives across India under Swachh Bharat 2022 from Chandani Chowk, Delhi. Which of the following statements is/are incorrect about Swachh Bharat 2022?
options: It is a month long campaign launched from 1st to 31st October 2022
The campaign aims to collect 5 crore kg of waste
The campaign has been conducted across 6 lakh villages of 744 districts across India
The campaign has been launched by Department of Youth Affairs
All of the above are correct

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are correct about NCF for Foundational Stage?
options: It uses ‘play,’ at the core of the conceptual, operational, and transactional approaches to curriculum organization, pedagogy, time and content organization, and the overall experience of the child.
It will enable the achievement of foundational Literacy and Numeracy for children
It aims to address the Foundational Stage in institutional settings, within the overall context of Early Childhood Care & Education (ECCE).
This is the first Stage in the 5+3+3+4 Curricular and Pedagogical restructuring of School Education as envisioned in NEP 2020.
All of the above statements are correct

quiz.text: The foundational stage refers to children in the age group of _____.
options: 2 to 5 years
3 to 8 years
4 to 6 years
3 to 7 years
4 to 8 years

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), the Union Ministry of Education has launched National Curriculum Framework (NCF) for Foundational Stage. NCF for school education comprises of how many stages?
options: Four
Three
Five
Six
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently, the Union Ministry of Education has launched Balvatika Classes for students in a set of _____ Kendira Vidyalayas?
options: 50
25
38
62
49

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), which of the following payment banks has collaborated with Reserve Bank Innovation Hub [RBIH] to expand rural finance to a billion Indians?
options: Jio Payment Bank
India Post Payment Bank
Paytm Payment Bank
Airtel Payment Bank
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following is the theme of the event?
options: A Pathway Towards Sustainable Future
Adopting Strategy for Synergizing and Strengthening Defence and Security Cooperation
Challenges Opportunities and Collaborations in the Indian Ocean.
Path to Pride
None of the above

quiz.text: SAGAR vision was announced by the Prime Minister of India in which of the following years?
options: 2014
2015
2016
2012
2013

quiz.text: Which of the following statements are correct about Mission LiFE?
options: First proposed by the Prime Minister of India at COP 26 in Glasgow, UK
It is an India-led global mass movement
The objective is to mobilise at least one billion Indians and other global citizens to take individual and collective action for protecting and preserving the environment in the period 2022 to 2027
Atleast 80% of all villages and urban local bodies are aimed to become environment-friendly by 2028
All of the above statements are correct

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are incorrect about Mission LiFE?
options: The duration of the mission is 5 years
It proposes a four pronged strategy
The mission will be implemented by Union Ministry of Environment, Forest & Climage change from the 2nd to 5th year
Mission LiFE emboldens the spirit of the P3 model, i.e. Pro Planet People
It functions on the basic principles of ‘Lifestyle of the planet, for the planet and by the planet’.

quiz.text: What is the validity of ‘One Health - Joint Plan of Action’ discussed in above paragraph?
options: Year 2022 to 2024
Year 2022 to 2025
Year 2022 to 2026
Year 2022 to 2027
Year 2022 to 2028

quiz.text: Which of the following is not one among the Four institutions involved in forming the ‘One Health - Joint Plan of Action’?
options: United Nations - Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO)
United Nations Environment Programme (UNEP)
World Health Organization (WHO)
People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals (PETA)
World Organisation for Animal Health

quiz.text: Which of the following is/are among the Six key areas focussed in the above action plan?A. One Health capacity for health systemsB. Emerging and re-emerging zoonotic epidemicsC. Neglected tropical and vector-borne diseasesD. Food safety risks
options: A, B and C
B, C and D
A, C and D
A, B and D
A, B, C and D

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), the Department of Expenditure under Ministry of Finance released an amount of Rs. 1,764 Crore to 4 States for providing grants to Million Plus Cities/Urban Agglomerations (MPC/UAs). Which of the following States is not included under allocation of this grant?
options: Andhra Pradesh
Odisha
Chhattisgarh
Maharashtra
Uttar Pradesh

quiz.text: According to a recent data released by Goods & Services Tax Network (GSTN), states with a strong manufacturing base performed well in GST revenue collection. As per this data, Maharashtra has topped among the states collecting highest amount of GST on a monthly basis followed by _________.
options: Karnataka
Tamil Nadu
Madhya Pradesh
Gujarat
Jharkhand

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), the Department of Pension & Pensioners’ Welfare (DoPPW), under the Ministry of Personnel, Public Grievances & Pensions, has launched the BHAVISHYA 9.0 – a Single Integrated Pensioners’ Portal. DoPPW has collaborated with which of the following banks to develop Bhavishya 9.0 portal?
options: State Bank of India (SBI)
Bank of Baroda (BoB)
Union Bank of India
HDFC Bank
ICICI Bank

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), the Union Minister of Home Affairs has approved Rs. 17.20 crore as the 2nd installment of the Central share of the State Disaster Response Fund (SDRF) to be released to Nagaland for 2022-23.The State Disaster Response Fund (SDRF) was recommended by which finance commission?
options: 11th Finance Commission
12th Finance Commission
13th Finance Commission
14th Finance Commission
15th Finance Commission

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), 14th Tribal Youth Exchange Programme for the development of Tribal Youth has been organised in New Delhi. It was organised by Nehru Yuva Kendra Sangathan (NYKS) in collaboration with Ministry of Home Affairs and ______________.
options: Ministry of Youth Affairs and Sports
Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship
Ministry of Education Science and Technology
Ministry of Tribal Affairs
Ministry of Minority Affairs
